name: Bubble Shooter - Christmas Pop
description:
Ready, aim, fire!! Throw bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to victory! Plan your every pop!

MAIN FEATURES:
- 1000+ addictive puzzles with more added all the time!
- Amazing arsenal of powerups & combos!
- Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
- Stunning graphics & adorable animations!

Like US:
https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterChristmasPop
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
